name: Lil'Blu
description:
Captain, it's time to rescue the Oids. 

Pilot your tiny blue ship, create passages and caverns in the terrain, construct bases and manage resources, all whilst keeping the local nasties at bay. 

#IndieDev | #IndieGame | #LilBlu
#action #strategy #adventure #arcade #retro #scifi #shooter
